net.protheos.neural.matrix

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport
      • net.protheos.core.BasicObject
        • net.protheos.neural.matrix.Matrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.management.NotificationBroadcaster, javax.management.NotificationEmitter, BasicObjectMBean

    public class Matrix
extends BasicObject
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
    Matrix: This class implements a mathematical matrix. Matrix math is very important to neural network processing. Many of the classes developed in this book will make use of the matrix classes in this package.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Jeff Heaton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
